summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 FOREST RIVER CEDAR CREEK FIFTH WHEEL RV. THE AXLE HAS A SPINDLE THAT WAS MISALIGNED. THIS CONDITION CAUSED SEVERE TIRE FAILURE ON ALL FOUR TIRES. THE FOREST RIVER  MANUFACTURER  WAS NOTIFIED, AND HE WAS REFERRED TO AL-KO COBAR CORPORATION. HE WAS ADVISED BY A  REPRESENTATIVE TO SHIP THE OLD SET  AXLE TO ELKHART, INDIANA FOR EXAMINATION AND REPAIR.  HE SHIPPED THE AXLE BACK IN SEPTEMBER 9, 2007 AND  HAS NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. THE MILEAGE WAS NOT APPLICABLE.
